critique: The document is an executive order regarding land reservation in Alaska for the Navy Department. As the President, the primary emotion I want to elicit is a sense of assurance and stability, but the document itself is very factual and procedural. There isn't much emotional content to work with. Therefore, most scores will be low. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1
